title: Clean Room
description: An insider is smuggling micro-components out through approved waste channels.

scenes.narrative: You've infiltrated the clean room facility where the components are manufactured. Suspicious waste containers are being moved out more frequently than usual.

choices.label: Blend in as maintenance staff to monitor the waste process.
choices.consequence: You observe the insider carefully packaging components in waste containers.

choices.label: Review waste manifests for anomalies.
choices.consequence: You find discrepancies in the waste volume that don't match production records.

choices.label: Install micro-sensors on waste containers.
choices.consequence: Sensors detect unusual weight and movement patterns in specific containers.

choices.label: Something's off about the air filtration - investigate that instead.
choices.consequence: You discover the filtration system is being used to mask the component removal.

scenes.narrative: You confront the insider in the waste processing area. They claim the extra waste is due to production errors.

choices.label: Question them about the production process diplomatically.
choices.consequence: They reveal details about how components are hidden in waste streams.

choices.label: Cross-reference waste with inventory logs.
choices.consequence: Logs show components missing that should have been in the waste.

choices.label: Scan containers with X-ray device.
choices.consequence: The scan reveals hidden compartments with micro-components.

choices.label: The waste smells wrong - it's not just components.
choices.consequence: You find additional contraband mixed with the components.
